text:
Tyk.io | Mid-level Go Developer | London, Singapore | REMOTE | Full-time

We're looking for a Go Developer that can work with our open-source engineering team and cloud edge to deliver the next generation of the Tyk platform.

Interested? Get in touch with us at talent@tyk.io

Here's what you will be working on:

- The open source API Gateway

- Our multi-data-center distributed API platform

- The next-get cloud infrastructure of our public SaaS

Tech Stack: Go, more Go, React, with a sprinkling of Python, JS and gRPC

Read more about the role and apply here: https://tyk.io/about/team/mid-go-developer/, or email us directly at talent@tyk.io
